title: I'm over this game and it's ridiculous punishments
body:
One game rage and suspension, makes sense.

Game 1
Pre-Game
Like97Samurai: Tank Sion?
Like97Samurai: This is low silver :/
Like97Samurai: we suck

Was asking if the Sion was going tank as support to determine my pick. Answered the question asked about what tier this was as someone was in placements, added we suck as that's the general consensus, people laughed.

In-Game
Like97Samurai: Okay bot lane the joke is over
Like97Samurai: gg
Like97Samurai: What's it like having a competent bot lane
Like97Samurai: ?
Like97Samurai: So bad
Like97Samurai: so so bad

Started 0-5

Like97Samurai: No
Like97Samurai: I'm letting you know your mid is top
Like97Samurai: Since you didn't
Like97Samurai: Looked at history, nope you didn't
Like97Samurai: "fiora signals enemies are missing"
Like97Samurai: And took him 100 years to follow
Like97Samurai: Without his ult
Like97Samurai: He didn't have ult
Like97Samurai: No it isn't
Like97Samurai: Just bad
Like97Samurai: Getting ganked like mad up here and no help
Like97Samurai: No pings
Like97Samurai: No follows
Like97Samurai: Typical bronze trash

Got ganked multiple times with no pings, no follows

Like97Samurai: lol what a gtank
Like97Samurai: To ganks
Like97Samurai: And no help from you
Like97Samurai: Oh please
Like97Samurai: They are just mad
Like97Samurai: Report me for nothing
Like97Samurai: And you're not inting?
Like97Samurai: The ganks are what is keeping me down
Like97Samurai: Oh look 2 again
Like97Samurai: Only time I have died was to multiple people
Like97Samurai: You act like you're a good jungler
Like97Samurai: You haven't helped anyone
Like97Samurai: Only losing to jungle ganks and a mid gank
Like97Samurai: No pressure from you at all
Like97Samurai: Lol
Like97Samurai: Only because you can't jg

Everyone starts yelling to report me over and over. I point out that I have gotten zero help and we now have a bot lane that is inting on purpose because of his poor start.

Like97Samurai: Not worth
Like97Samurai: Report the leaver
Like97Samurai: Rotated and look what happens
Like97Samurai: Wow
Like97Samurai: No way
Like97Samurai: Nah
Like97Samurai: You died in .5 seconds
Like97Samurai: I'll be top
Like97Samurai: Don't bother pinging
Like97Samurai: Keep being 0--10 with an 8 vision score
Like97Samurai: So useful

Our jungle left the game for awhile after we didn't surrender, I rotated bot side only to die as I knew this would happen. I rotated because I was yelled at for not rotating before. Stated I would be top and not rotating anymore as the game was over with a leaver and an inter.

Like97Samurai: I mean if you don't want to ff then get back and protect it
Like97Samurai: Sure but maybe capitolize on something when they send 3 top?
Like97Samurai: Good suicide dude
Like97Samurai: What a play
Like97Samurai: Glad we played that out
Like97Samurai: That was fun
Like97Samurai: What a game
Like97Samurai: What a team
Like97Samurai: So impressed
Like97Samurai: Proud of you

We didn't surrender so I pinged the base to protect it. The jungler came back and inted on purpose, sarcastically stated how happy I was to play that game out.

Post-Game
Like97Samurai: What a game
Like97Samurai: What a team
Like97Samurai: What a bot lane
Like97Samurai: What a jungler
Like97Samurai: I love this game
Like97Samurai: So much fun
Like97Samurai: You never know what to expect
Like97Samurai: I hope to play with you all again soon
Like97Samurai: Such fun
Like97Samurai: You didn't beat me up
Like97Samurai: Your team helped every fight
Like97Samurai: I got none of that
Like97Samurai: You on your own did not win
Like97Samurai: You and your team won
Like97Samurai: Dominated
Like97Samurai: Wish I could have had the help that you got

Sarcasm again because of the intentional feed bot lane and the leaving jungler, sarcastically stated my love for the game.


At no point did I swear or use any type of derogatory terms. Sure I flamed but it's the constant frustration of having teams that refuse to help, leave, and then feed on purpose when they don't get their way. I am the one who is punished while we can have people continue to leave games and run it down after they don't get their surrender vote through. I play it out and get punished. I'm so tired of this game and it's ridiculous bans and suspensions. It is an absolute joke that a person gets removed for literally nothing. 

I can already tell you how the response to this thread will go, "you should have just muted them", "you are responsible for your own actions", and "you broke the rules", It's going to be the typical holier than thou attitude.

I'm not denying that I was mad and probably flamed a bit but wow this is not a deserved ban, especially with it being for one game. I don't even know why I'm posting this on here but I am.

Some flaming? You talked a lot and didn't say a single positive thing. I'd say you did go over the line and deserve a punishment. If this is the first punishment you've ever gotten and the "suspension" you mention was an actual 14-day suspension, skipping both chat restrictions, it is possible that the system picked up on the mention of "suicide" and didn't get that you meant an in-game death, in which case Riot support might be willing to reduce the punishment (but not necessarily your "punishment tier," meaning the next offense might still mean a permaban) to a chat restriction. If you got a chat restriction for this, or if it was a 14-day suspension after previous chat restrictions, then there's nothing wrong. Also note that the reform card shows 1-5 games that contributed to your punishment. If you think this match wasn't too bad, it's entirely possible there are other matches that were worse than you thought.

The reform card is one game. I even logged in to confirm and it is based on one game. I didn't think it would consider the suicide term there, perhaps it did pick up on that. Also you're right there was nothing positive said in chat because nothing positive happened in that game. 1 teammate who inted and one teammate who left for not getting the surrender vote but we all know they didn't get punished.

You haven't given enough information for us to know what punishment you actually got or should have gotten, and support might be of assistance with informing you of your punishment tier and adjusting your current punishment if necessary, but you can count on ending up with some kind of punishment for this behavior.

It really doesn't though. The card says, "Other players judged your comms to be far below the standards of the League community". It then provides one game on comms. This 100% shows me that it is basing the punishment off of one game, which is a joke. Secondly if those comms are far below the standards of the League community, I have a bridge to sell you. The junk I see on here with people being told to kill them selves all the time, give me a break. As I said I reached out to support, nothing will happen and people will continue to be abusive, leave games, and intentionally feed.

No, the games it lists are intentionally very limited. Games that are too old or had only a little bad chat may not be shown even if they contributed to the punishment. The goal is not to present every sliver of evidence against you, it's to give you an idea as to what sort of behavior you were punished for.

This is at least how it was a couple years ago and I've not seen tantram or anyone saying it's been updated.

That really does not make any sense though.

You were bad, but you don't get to know how bad you were. You get suspended for being bad, but we won't tell you what you did to deserve that suspension.

Riot prides itself on information and data gathering yet they don't provide you with any insight to an absolutely ridiculous suspension. They just throw a robot at it and it bans you if people click on report.

Let's not have you use the system's lack of transparency and make yourself think you are innocent.

Yes the reform card can use better transparency and tell you how many games (or percentage) you were validly reported. 

But if you are using this as an excuse to say you are not toxic and don't deserve a punishment, then you are so wrong.

I do not deserve the punishment they gave, that's what I'm saying. The reform card absolutely needs to be more transparent but here is the thing, if you can't provide the proof, then you have to be innocent.

Let's have you understand the behavioral system a bit more. Think of it like a health bar (or tension meter) in music games. When you hit the note at an off beat,  your tension meter  increases. When you completely miss a note, the meter increases by alot. When you hit the note at good timings, it reduces the meter. 

Riot's behavior system works the same way, as in we all have a toxicity meter attached to our accounts. When players are mildly toxic, it goes up a tad. When people use hate speech, it pretty much fills up the meter. of course, clean games reduce the meter. 

It is possible for playerA to get punished and playerB not to, even though playerB was waaayyyyy more toxic . Let's say playerA started the game with the toxicity meter at 95% and playerB's at 35%. Ingame, playerB said some pretty nasty shit and playerA responds with some shit as well. After the game, playerA gains 10% toxicity and playerB gains 50%. Now playerA is at 105% toxicity and gets punished, whereas playerB is at 85%, and not punished in that specific game, even though playerB was found to be 5x more toxic than playerA in that game.

I am only going to respond to this one but I appreciate both of your comments. You actually give really great insight as to the system. Thank you for taking the time.

I will however disagree with the fact that Riot is putting up a suspension on my account. I didn't do anything or say anything over the line. I see people constantly tell others to kill themselves and that goes unpunished. I firmly believe that the punishment does not fit the crime here.

I get it, I flamed sure but I don't believe I should be punished to this extent.

Btw, are you aware of the escalating punishment ladder? It goes as follows;

1. 10 game chat restriction
2. 25 game chat restriction
3. 14-day ban
4. Permaban

This is the punishment model that Riot is using for repeat consistent offenders, where you'd be escalated to the next punishment tier if you haven't shown the system enough reform. 

People have been punished with a permaban for the smallest things (like report rallying) right after their 14-day ban because they couldn't show the system that they've reformed.

A while back, someone tested the use of Zero Tolerance phrases (such as n%%%%%%, f%%%%%, c%%%, or encouraging others to die)  and they claim that you needed to say it 3 times within the game to get immediately punished with a 14-day ban. 

So if that theory is true, then the people whom you see are encouraging others to harm themselves is just not using it enough to get them immediately punished.

I am aware of the punishment ladder but I'm also aware that it really isn't a ladder and the can go straight to whatever punishment they want. I mean if they don't adhere to their own guidelines what's the point in having them? Look the fact of the matter is the punishment they threw out is too severe for what was said. I didn't say anything that is over the line.

Did you also know there are 2 types of verbal toxicity?



The standard verbal harassment will go through the standard ladder, but it can take a couple dozens of games before some can get punished for it. 


Zero tolerance phrases like I mention earlier that can skip punishment tiers, because those slurs are just really that bad. These are rumored to punish someone within 3 uses.

It's not that they don't adhere to it, it's just that they have different policies for it, but many people don't know there is a different policy for the extreme hate speech. 

They've clearly mentioned it in there support article;
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q2

Meh, they updated their wording on the reform card and it no longer says the games shown are examples of unaccept able behavior.  Those are still examples of your unacceptable behavior 

Im going to explain the system to you in a simplified model; Anyone that clicks on the report button will trigger a review, the system will review your game for toxicity and assign a toxicity score (0 for no toxicity, 100 for hate speech) for that game. When you reach a toxicity score of 100, you'll get punished. 

So while anyone who clicks the report button will be used against you is true to a certain extent, the system does have the capacity to verify the reports, so your statement is also not so true.

The reform card is limited in space, so it can't show you everything. If you write to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us , you can ask them how many games were considered in your punishment. Although tier1 support will only be able to tell you up to the past 20 games.
